{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_SetUserArray}} '''A_SetUserArray''' (string ''name'', int ''index'', int ''value'')
Sets the calling actor's [[user array]] of type '''int''' named ''name'', at position ''index'', to ''value''. The name must begin with <tt>user_</tt>.
User arrays are not used by anything internally, contrarily to the args array and the special1 and special2 fields.
